entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
